product1.name: Samsung galaxy s6
product1.description: The Samsung Galaxy S6 is powered by 1.5GHz octa-core Samsung Exynos 7420 processor and it comes with 3GB of RAM. The phone packs 32GB of internal storage cannot be expanded.

product2.name: Nokia lumia 1520
product2.description: The Nokia Lumia 1520 is powered by 2.2GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM.

product3.name: MacBook Pro
product3.description: Apple has introduced three new versions of its MacBook Pro line, including a 13-inch and 15-inch model with the Touch Bar, a thin, multi-touch strip display that sits above the MacBook Pro's keyboard.
